snippet: Condé Nast Traveler will soon offer its readers — and its advertisers — pages that are larger and thicker, an investment in print even as most magazines are shifting their focus to digital.
abstract: Luxury travel magazine Conde Nast Traveler will increase size and heft of magazine beginning in September, significant print investment at time when many publications are focusing on digital; larger pages will not only allow for better showcasing of magazine's photography, but also will offer more space to advertisers.
lead_paragraph: Condé Nast Traveler will soon offer its readers — and its advertisers — pages that are larger and thicker, an investment in print even as most magazines are shifting their focus to digital.

headline.main: Condé Nast Traveler Magazine Grows Voluptuous in Lean Times
headline.print_headline: Condé Nast’s Luxury Travel Magazine Grows Voluptuous in Lean Times for Print Media
